{"id":533114806,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1628069182,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/533114806/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic: int mx,n,m,s;\n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int i,int j){\n        if(i<0 || i>=m || j<0 || j>=n || grid[i][j]!=1){\n            if(mx<s)mx=s;\n            return;\n        } \n        s++;\n        grid[i][j]=2;\n        dfs(grid,i+1,j);\n        dfs(grid,i,j+1);\n        dfs(grid,i-1,j);\n        dfs(grid,i,j-1);\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        mx=0;m=grid.size();n=grid[0].size();\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++)\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    s=0;\n                    dfs(grid,i,j);\n                }\n            }\n        return mx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
